title: Screen issues when firmly pressing
content:
If I firmly press parts of the screen I get pink bands

Sometimes the screen takes a few seconds to light up. Sometimes it doesn't light up at all. Firmly pressing near the middle of the screen turns the screen off

Restarting my phone seems to bring the screen back until the problem comes back again
